模块 com.example.BubbleBobble
程序包 com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.SpecialItem

类 BombItem

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
com.example.BubbleBobble.GameObject
com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.SpecialItem.SpecialItem
com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.SpecialItem.BombItem
所有已实现的接口:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class BombItem extends SpecialItem
The concrete class for bomb item, the bomb item handles all interactions between the hero and the bomb item The class uses strategy design pattern, specified in SpecialItemStrategy package When hero hit a bomb item, the lives value of hero will be deducted by one.

  • 属性概要
